Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "That was close... This is the first time I've seen a Corrupted like that.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Liv, can you look up information on Vassago? We'll need more effective strategies next time we encounter it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Of course. Vassago, a bionic mechanoid of a high-level experiment project, violent in nature...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Sensors are installed all over its body, very sensitive to movement, heat, smell, and shortwave communication signals.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But its visual sensors are just average, if you want to avoid Vassago, it's recommended to set a lure.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "There's nothing we can use as a lure right now, unless...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Lee, Kamui is our comrade, and we do not leave comrades behind...', 4: '1'}
